survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Ride-Hailing Services
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of ride-hailing services to understand their satisfaction levels and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often do you use ride-hailing services?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options cover all frequency ranges.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice question; display as radio buttons.

script.question_text: How often do you use ride-hailing services?

questions.question_text: Which ride-hailing services have you used in the past 3 months? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional inputs.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice question; display as checkboxes with an optional text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which ride-hailing services have you used in the past 3 months? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason you use ride-hailing services?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice with an 'Other' option for additional insights.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice question with radio buttons and optional text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What is the primary reason you use ride-hailing services?

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the overall experience of using ride-hailing services? (1 = Very dissatisfied, 5 = Very satisfied)
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring satisfaction. Ensure the scale is clearly labeled.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice question; display as radio buttons with a labeled scale.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the overall experience of using ride-hailing services? (1 = Very dissatisfied, 5 = Very satisfied)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for ride-hailing services?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Open-text question; display as a large text input field.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for ride-hailing services?
